channel.title: TikZ on Álvaro A. Gutiérrez Vargas
channel.description: Recent content in TikZ on Álvaro A. Gutiérrez Vargas

item.title: TikZ coordinate graph from scratch. The simple, but effective way.
item.description: Lately, I needed to create a couple of graphs to exemplify something in a manuscript that I have been working on. Even though, I was relatively familiar with TikZ, given the immense amount of templates online it was quite difficult to stick to only one, because most of them had so many unnecessary features for my purpose. Finally, using the two references listed at the bottom I came up with something quite useful and intuitive to solve my problem.
